name: J-Town: A Visual Novel
summary: A friendly crash course in Japanese American history, culture, and community! Inspired by the real stories of the three historic Japantowns of California: San Francisco, San Jose, and Los Angeles's Little Tokyo.

name: JTAC Beats
summary: Utilize rhythm to direct your fields of fire to beat the enemy with the drums of war. Let them die for their country to the songs of your people.

name: JTron
summary: JTron is a puzzle game, developed and published by Amigan Software, which was released in 2003.
